fields_of_interest: Trade, Competition, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Digital economy and society, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: We follow these policies: Digital Single Market, Competition, Taxation, Data Protection, Trade. In particular, the DSM includes a number of initiatives that are of interest, including on platform-to-business relations, and a range of actions undertaken by EU institutions on illegal content online. In this context, we plan to meet with Commission officials, and Members and officials of the European Parliament to explain what we do (for example to keep illegal content off our platforms) and what we believe the best policy approach is for the EU.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: We have not undertaken any PR, projects, events or publications activities in our financial year 2016-2017 or in financial year 2017-2018.
goals__remit: We are the world’s fastest-growing online classifieds network; we make it easier for people to trade with each other, fostering economic growth in local communities.
